descripcion: An issue in H3C M102G HM1A0V200R010 wireless controller and BA1500L SWBA1A0V100R006 wireless access point, there is a misconfiguration vulnerability about vsftpd. Through this vulnerability, all files uploaded anonymously via the FTP protocol is automatically owned by the root user and remote attackers could gain root-level control over the devices. 06/01/2026 06/01/2026 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 9.80 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) CRITICAL
